title: Zetwerk Manufacturing gets module supply order from NTPC
description: Zetwerk Manufacturing has secured a contract from state-owned NTPC to supply solar modules for its project in Gujarat. The order entails manufacturing and providing 1,515 MWp (megawatt peak) of ALMM-compliant 'Made in India' solar photovoltaic modules, along with mandatory spares, for the Khavda Solar project, which has a capacity of 1,200 MW.
